title: For everyone who got Leaverbuster / Loot penalties and lost LP
body:
Submit a support ticket to Riot ( https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new ). I did mine under "Technical problems / Game Crash".

Tell them to reinstate your lost LP and remove the Leaverbuster penalty.

I got this message finally when the game ended (apparently only myself and another teammate d/c'd): "You are ineligible to earn loot due to leaving or AFK behaviors."

Hopefully Riot will fix these issues for us since it's clearly a problem on their end.

replies.body: Nobody would ever experience loss of loot priviliges based on a one off dc that you blame the servers for, a loot loss restriction would only ever be placed on consistently poor behavior.

Under report a bug on the client?
No, here on the website under the Support portal. You have to login with your account credentials and submit a ticket. Usually it's the best and "official" way to get support from Riot.

Leaverbuster penalties do not impact your eligibility for receiving loot.  Per the [hextech restrictions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463-Hextech-Crafting-Restrictions) guide, they will occur from behavioral penalties enacted by the [Instant Feedback System](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-).   Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you'd like any context specific to your issue.

Regarding yesterday's server issues, yeah it was a crappy situation.  This wasn't an ISP issue, but an occurrence more specifically with our game servers.  Some players did get penalties like Leaverbuster, and it's feedback we'd like to collect.  If you were impacted by the server issue via leaverbuster, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). I can't make any guarantees, but we're happy to consider all things.  That said, bear in mind that we literally have no ability to adjust game stats or LP.  Thanks for sharing your concerns on this!

I did send a support ticket, but I got an auto response and when I tried to request a human I got a 'page not found' error.  I'm concerned because I think it's unfair that I couldn't play while having an xp boost active.
That's strange, are you logged into the ticketing center?  If you're logged out then you won't be able to see the ticket.  Let me know if that was it!

I logged in and I found a link to check my support tickets and it wasn't listed.  Y_Y  I just now sent a second one.  It gave me the auto response again, so I requested a human and this time it says an agent will contact me.

We were made aware of an issue affecting a number of players earlier today that resulted in widespread disconnections. You can keep up to date in the post we made [**here**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/3Lmbjp8Y-3132017-na-server-issues).

As always, we appreciate your patience while we iron out this issue!
